Class StandardDBFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--DBQueryFactory
        |
        +--StandardDBFactory
public class StandardDBFactory
extends DBQueryFactory

The StandardDBFactory implements the only abstract methods i nthe abstract DBQueryFactory. It create and return DBQuery.
